refnamediv.refpurpose: Sets access and modification time of file

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Attempts to set the access and modification time of the file named by filename to the value given by time. If the parameter time is not given, uses the present time. This is equivalent to what utime (sometimes referred to as utimes) does. If the third parameter atime is present, the access time of the given filename is set to the value of atime. Note that the access time is always modified, regardless of the number of parameters.
If the file does not exist, it is created. &return.success;

warning.para: It's not currently possible to change the modification time of a directory with this function under Windows.

example.title: touch example
example.programlisting:
<?php
if (touch($FileName)) {
    echo "$FileName modification time has been changed to present time";
} else {
    echo "Sorry, could not change modification time of $FileName";
}
?>
